name: Low Pipe
description:
A game made in 2 days for LD48

In Low Pipe your only objective is to get to the bottom of a randomly generated mine. Whats stopping you? A bunch of enemies and a giant rock that's falling and crushing the mine!

How will you get down the mine fast enough? By absorbing the blood of your enemies of course!

Important stuff:

Link to source code: https://github.com/SpaceGuineaProductions/Low-Pipe-LD48

Link to Ludum Dare page: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/48/$247622
